evidence.text: Because Petitioners have met this burden, the Court orders that Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado.

extracted.value: Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado

evidence.text: Respondents shall provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation.

extracted.value: Respondents shall provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation

evidence.text: Such notice must state the government intends to remove individuals pursuant to the Act and Proclamation.

extracted.value: Such notice must state the government intends to remove individuals pursuant to the Act and Proclamation

evidence.text: It must also provide notice of a right to seek judicial review, and inform individuals they may consult an attorney regarding their detainment and the government's intent to remove them.

extracted.value: Such notice must also provide notice of a right to seek judicial review

extracted.value: Such notice must inform individuals they may consult an attorney regarding their detainment and the government's intent to remove them

evidence.text: Such notice must be written in a language the individual understands.
